alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:24PM EDT until June 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHERN PRINCE EDWARD COUNTIES... At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Guinea Mills, or 8 miles north of Farmville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Cumberland and northern Prince Edward Counties, including the following locations... Raines Tavern, Tuggle and Reeds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
